definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Your price is too high to even interest buyers in counter-offer.
sentences.chinese: 你的價格太高，買方連還盤都沒有興趣。

sentences.english: Templates and foundation bolting shall be shipped separately from the vessels according to Purchaser's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 樣板及地腳螺栓應根據買方指導同容器分開運輸。

sentences.english: If you've got cash and don't need to worry about interest rates, it's a buyer's market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有現金，並不擔心利率，這是一個買方市場。

sentences.english: The women, being in a buyer’s market, can set high standards.
sentences.chinese: 而婦女則成爲買方市場，她們可以設置極高的標準。

sentences.english: The tank strapper is usually a representative of the buyer or transportation company.
sentences.chinese: 油罐測量員通常爲買方或運輸公司的代表。

sentences.english: Buyer reserve right of claim charge quality below standard.
sentences.chinese: 因質量不夠標準，買方保留索賠權。

sentences.english: The difference between the two is the bank’s fee and profit.
sentences.chinese: 買方和賣方之間的差額就是銀行的費用和利潤。

sentences.english: The buyer should pay total amount to seller by T/T within 10 days after receipt of the concerning original B/L.
sentences.chinese: 買方應在收到正本提單後10天內電匯支付全部貨款。

sentences.english: Insurance covers FPA and W. A. only if the Buyers require it to be added.
sentences.chinese: 假如買方要求加上保險，那麼只保平安險和水漬險。

sentences.english: Yes, of course. You have the right of reinspection .
sentences.chinese: 請你告訴我，貨物抵達或買方是否有權複查？

sentences.english: THALES Communications shall inform the Buyer of the anticipated date(s) of performance of the FAT.
sentences.chinese: 泰雷茲通信公司應通知買方預計進行FAT的日期。

sentences.english: A new buyer-seller watermarking protocol without the third party was proposed, which used the idea of secret sharing and homomorphic public key cryptosystem.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的無第三方參與的買方賣方水印協議。

sentences.english: I mean what would the control authority do with the domestic currency owned by foreigners?
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是管匯當局是外匯的惟一買方和賣方。

sentences.english: The buyer's capital will be tied up from the time of remitting it until the goods arrive and are sold.
sentences.chinese: 從匯款時起直到貨物到達和銷售掉，買方會積壓資金。

sentences.english: We are entitled to cancel the contract which become overdue owing to the buyer' non - performance.
sentences.chinese: 我們有權取消因買方不履行而過期的合同。

definition: to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
